detail_desc: Ankle boots in imitation leather with a strap and adjustable fastener at the front. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with a print motif, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted jumpsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and print motif on the legs.
Fitted jumpsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and print motif on the legs.
Bag in grained imitation leather with a metal-chain and imitation leather shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 17x25 cm.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with satin details, a flap with a metal snap lock, and metal chain shoulder strap. One small inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x13.5x18.5 cm.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips. High waist with laser-cut edges, wide lace at the sides and a lined gusset.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a zip at the top. Zip down the front,flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped chest pocket, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Off-the-shoulder, cotton poplin top with a unique nursing feature, smocking with shoulder straps at the top and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a frill-trimmed seam at the top, buttons at the back and flared skirt. Unlined.

Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.

Dungaree shorts in soft washed denim with adjustable straps with a press-stud and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket with text embroidery, a back pocket, fake front pockets and belt loops at the front. Short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.

Sleeveless romper suit in a patterned cotton crêpe weave with shoulder straps that have a sewn-on bow at the front and elastication at the back, and long legs. Press-studs at the crotch and along the legs in size 6-12M.

Long chiffon dress with a lace bodice, wide neckline and short cap sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain band that ties at the back and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.

Set with a dungaree dress and short-sleeved top. Dress in soft washed denim with embroidery on the front, adjustable straps with press-studs and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist.
